name: Simple Escape (SpaceGames)
description:
Well, we know that the game may be the worst thing you see from us, but its idea is good and we think that it is playable or worth a try, as you know.

Because even the developers couldn't win :)

Of course, we reviewed whether victory is possible or not, and the result is that it is possible, but perhaps not quickly

Well, let's move on to the next

The idea of the game is as simple as its name, as you know

All you have to do is control the player and try to avoid the obstacles that appear randomly and are heading in front of you and stay steadfast for about 200 seconds and no more.

That's it, the fun thing about it is that it's very difficult :)
